metadata.title: CVE-2022-31799 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Bottle before 0.12.20 mishandles errors during early request binding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bottle - 0.12.19-1+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bottle package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.19-1+deb11u1build0.22.04.1').
